verses.text: O give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for \add he is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
O give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* unto the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
O give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* to the \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w* of \w lords|strong="H0113"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
To him who alone \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w wonders|strong="H6381"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
To him that by \w wisdom|strong="H8394"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

To him that stretched \w out|strong="H7554"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* above the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
To him that \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w lights|strong="H0216"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:

The \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* to \w rule|strong="H4475"\w* by \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:\f + \fr 136.8 \ft to ruleâ€¦: Heb. for the rulings by day\f*

The \w moon|strong="H3394"\w* and \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* to \w rule|strong="H4475"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
To him that \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* in their \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:
And brought \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:

With a \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and with a stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

To him which \w divided|strong="H1504"\w* the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* into \w parts|strong="H1506"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:
And made \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of it: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:

But \w overthrew|strong="H5287"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* and his \w host|strong="H2428"\w* in the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 136.15 \ft overthrew: Heb. shaked off\f*
To him which \w led|strong="H3212"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* through the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
To him which \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:
And \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* \w famous|strong="H0117"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:
\w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:
And \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:
And \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* their \w land|strong="H0776"\w* for an \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:
\add Even\add* an \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w* unto \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
Who \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* us in our low \w estate|strong="H8216"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:
And hath \w redeemed|strong="H6561"\w* us from our \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
Who \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* to all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
O give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* unto the \w God|strong="H0410"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
